dict.acceptation: 有意识的，神志清醒的；自觉的，有意的；（痛苦，感情，冷气等）感觉得到的；同“self-conscious“；

sent.orig: The least self-conscious of styles should require the most self-conscious of corroborations.
sent.trans: 最不自觉的文体却需要有最有自觉的确证。

sent.orig: More and more people are weight-conscious as well l as health-conscious.
sent.trans: 越来越多的人在意体重的同时，也注重起身体健康。

sent.orig: Scientific neologism is itself just linguistic evolution gone self-conscious, as science is self-conscious common sense.
sent.trans: 科学上的新词本身就是自我意识到的语言演化的结果，就像科学是自我意识到的常识一样。

sent.orig: Is not attentiveness the nature of, even the function of, Conscious?
sent.trans: 专注不正是大我意识的本质甚或活动吗？

sent.orig: The emperor was acutely conscious of his image.
sent.trans: 哈德良国王深深地意识到自己的完好形象。
